title: Macron, Le Pen kick off French presidential runoff campaigns - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. Macron, Le Pen kick off French presidential runoff campaigns  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. France set for presidential runoff election between Macron and LePen  CBS News
  3. Emmanuel Macron to face Marine Le Pen in French presidential election runoff  CNN
  4. Opinion | A solid showing by French President Macron in the first-round voting bodes well for defeating far right candidate Marine Le Pen  The Washington Post
  5. French elections: Déjà vu all over again  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: PARIS (AP) — French President Emmanuel Macron declared Monday that he wants to “convince" a broad range of French voters to back his centrist vision, kicking off a two-week battle against far-right challenger Marine Le Pen ahead of the country's presidential runoff vote.
